Kajaani.title: Kajaani
Kajaani.byline: Kajaani (Swedish Kajana) is a town and municipality in Finland and the administrative capital of the Kainuu region.

Kajang.title: Kajang
Kajang.byline: Kajang is a city in southeastern Selangor.

Kajuru.title: Kajuru
Kajuru.byline: Kajuru (Adara: Ajure) is a local government area in southern Kaduna State, Nigeria.
